aboutMe.text: Hello, I am not a programmer. I am a Front-End Web Developer. Software development is not only about writing in a special language or knowing the newest tech stack. It is about problem-solving, about getting things done the way my customers want. It is about analysis, structuring, architecture. I collect the ideas of your vision and bring them to life — just the way you imagined! It is my passion to create software that is clear, functional, intuitive to use, and maintainable even after many years.
aboutMe.collaborate: Let's collaborate and build something remarkable together!

skills.introduction: In the past, i worked at least on 14 projects to learning the following skill set. These skills are constantly being expanded to keep up with the times.
